availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaiah R. Miller (Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Ann Anderson Miller in Calloway County, Kentucky, on July 30, 1844. Father of Isaac B. Miller, Matilda R. Miller, James H. Miller, Mary E. Miller, Harriet Jane Frances Miller, Sophronia R. Miller, and G. W. Miller. Farmer in Calloway County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Calloway County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Calloway County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 1, p. 460B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, p. 206.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994030, Calloway County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Calloway County Marriages, Film 001942719.
KYR-0001-025-0012.
